import{BigNumber}from'@ethersproject/bignumber';import{SupportedChainId}from'constants/chains';// add 20% (except on optimism)
export function calculateGasMargin(chainId,value){return chainId===SupportedChainId.OPTIMISM||chainId===SupportedChainId.OPTIMISTIC_KOVAN?value:value.mul(BigNumber.from(10000+2000)).div(BigNumber.from(10000));}
